name: A Halloween Away
description:
A Halloween Away is a short story about a cat who slept in a little too late to trick or treat. Somehow, they find themselves three days late for Halloween...

This is a short game made in roughly 26 hours at the request of a few friends.

Installation Instructions

Download the ZIP file and extract its contents to a folder. Run the HalloweenAway executable, clicking "yes" or "more info" + "run anyway" on the security prompt. You may need administrator privileges.
